title: Gamification Design and Application Strategies for Elementary Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Physical education pedagogy, fundamental gamification concepts, and instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Learners are trainees aiming to become physical education specialists, conducting gamification design practices in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create instructional design documents for elementary physical education classes utilizing gamification elements
Implement and evaluate gamified class simulations using smartphone-based tools
It can analyze the impact of gamification on children's self-efficacy, satisfaction, and motor skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
